Literature.Title: A class of highly potent antibacterial peptides derived from pardaxin, a pore-forming peptide isolated from Moses sole fish Pardachirus marmoratus.
Literature.Author: Oren Z, Shai Y

Literature.Title: Systematic comparison of activity and mechanism of antimicrobial peptides against nosocomial pathogens.
